snippet: Indiana rallied at home to upset No. 4 Iowa, 85-78, after blowing a big lead.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; Indiana beats No 4 Iowa, 85-78; other college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Indiana rallied at home to upset No. 4 Iowa, 85-78, after blowing a big lead.

headline.main: After Wasting Lead, Indiana Is Able to Upend No. 4 Iowa
headline.print_headline: After Wasting Lead, Indiana Is Able to Upend No. 4 Iowa
